sentences.en: A number of priceless works of art were stolen from the gallery.
sentences.cn: 美术馆中许多价值连城的艺术品被盗。

sentences.en: A politician may be tempted to play to the gallery.
sentences.cn: 政客可能很想博得群众的赏识.

sentences.en: an art/a picture gallery
sentences.cn: 美术馆；绘画陈列室

sentences.en: an exhibition of African art at the Hayward Gallery
sentences.cn: 海沃德美术馆的非洲艺术展览

sentences.en: He started working for a gallery sweeping up and making the tea.
sentences.cn: 他开始在画廊做扫地沏茶的工作。

sentences.en: Jenkinson instigated a refurbishment of the old gallery.
sentences.cn: 詹金森促成了老美术馆的重新整修。

sentences.en: Just a stone's throw away is the City Art Gallery.
sentences.cn: 不远处就是市美术馆。

sentences.en: Laura landed a plum job with a smart art gallery.
sentences.cn: 劳拉在一家时尚画廊找到了份美差。

sentences.en: Some of his paintings are on show in the local art gallery.
sentences.cn: 他的一些画正在当地的一些艺术馆展出.

sentences.en: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.cn: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.en: The art gallery waives admission charges on Sundays.
sentences.cn: 美术馆周日免收门票。

sentences.en: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.cn: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.en: The gallery has mounted an exhibition of art by Irish women painters.
sentences.cn: 画廊已举办了一场爱尔兰女画家的作品展。

sentences.en: The gallery is seeking to enlarge its holdings of Danish art.
sentences.cn: 画廊正在寻求增加丹麦艺术作品的馆藏.

sentences.en: The pictures in the gallery were well spaced out.
sentences.cn: 画廊中各幅画的间隔安排得很好.

sentences.en: The visitor's gallery in the House of Commons was full.
sentences.cn: 下议院的旁听席上坐满了人.

sentences.en: There were muted cheers from the public gallery.
sentences.cn: 旁听席传出了轻微的欢呼声。

sentences.en: They had been forced to find cheap tickets in the gallery.
sentences.cn: 他们不得已买了顶层楼座的廉价票。

sentences.en: We zoomed through the gallery.
sentences.cn: 我们飞快地穿过画廊。

sentences.en: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.cn: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

phrases.tran_cn: 迎合大众趣味；哗众取宠

trans.tran_cn: 画廊，走廊，（教堂，议院等的）边座，旁听席，大批观众
trans.tran_en: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art
